description: Craving comfort food? Whip up this quick and easy creamy chicken pasta bake for dinner tonight and serve it with a crunchy salad.
keywords: Pasta bake,High protein,Comfort food,Low sugar,Dinner Made Easy,Sep 2021
name: Creamy Chicken & Pea Pasta Bake Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Cook pasta in a saucepan of boiling, salted water according to packet instructions. Drain, reserving 1/2 cup cooking liquid.
Meanwhile, heat oil in a large frying pan over medium-high heat. Cook garlic and onion, stirring, for 5 minutes or until softened. Add cream, peas and chicken, then bring to the boil.
Stir in pasta, reserved cooking liquid, tasty cheese and half the basil. Transfer to a large baking dish.
Preheat grill to high. Sprinkle parmesan over pasta mixture. Grill for 5 minutes or until golden.
Meanwhile, prepare salad according to packet instructions. Top pasta bake with remaining basil and season with pepper. Serve with salad.
